Unfortunately, simple maneuverability is no match for decades of 
training and a severely unbalanced ratio of firepower and armour 
plating.  Gatara dodges a couple of shots while the remainder pock-
mark her flank.  In return, she slaps a new magazine of ammo into her 
machine gun and fires again, this time aiming for Kenzo's rotor 
assembly.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CatMaster o" <catmastero@y...> wrote:
> Kenzo's armor took most of the weapon fire however the windshield
> cracked. Kenzo flew to the left and fired his laser rapidly at her
> trying to use maneuverability to his advantage.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > Gatara takes the shot in her armoured shoulder plate, then takes 
to 
> > the air herself, blazing away with her combination weapon.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CatMaster o" <catmastero@y...> wrote:
> > > Kenzo was knocked back and damaged by the bulllets and 
explosions. 
> > He
> > > know if he stayed down he would be finished so he ignored his 
pain 
> > and
> > > transformed to his helochopter mode taking to the skys. He spun 
> > around
> > > and fired a laser at Gatara.
